psi-powers.name: Clairvoyance
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to see through the minds of others.

psi-powers.name: Confusion
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to confuse enemies.

psi-powers.name: Herbaphony
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to speak to plants.

psi-powers.name: Hydrokinesis
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to control the movement of water.

psi-powers.name: Invisibility
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to turn invisible for a short period of time.

psi-powers.name: Levitation
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to levitate using a levitation ball.

psi-powers.name: Marksmanship
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to strike things down using their mind.

psi-powers.name: PSI-Punch
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to break objects using their mind.

psi-powers.name: Pyrokinesis
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to set objects on fire using their mind.

psi-powers.name: Shield
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to create a psychic shield.

psi-powers.name: Telekinesis
psi-powers.description: Allows the user to move objects with their mind.
